alert.note: Alert for Adams; Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 5:04AM CDT until further notice by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Wisconsin... Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam affecting Adams and Juneau Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wisconsin River at Castle Rock Dam. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:10 AM CDT Monday the flow was 28,759.0 cfs. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning and continue rising to a crest of 36,000.0 cfs early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood flow is 30,000.0 cfs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse. The next statement will be issued by noon today.
